term: (("reinforcement learning"[tiab] OR "inverse reinforcement"[tiab] OR "markov decision"[tiab] OR MDP[tiab] OR "Q-learning"[tiab] OR "fitted Q"[tiab] OR "policy gradient"[tiab] OR "offline reinforcement"[tiab] OR "deep reinforcement"[tiab])) AND (("mechanical ventilation"[tiab] OR ventilator[tiab] OR "ventilatory support"[tiab])) AND ((wean*[tiab] OR extubat*[tiab] OR "ventilator liberation"[tiab] OR "spontaneous breathing trial"[tiab] OR SBT[tiab]))
